Tender Description: Support to develop and co-ordinate the campaign for Leeds to become a dementia-friendly place, by employing a part-time worker to carry out a range of activities.  These activities are flexible, and includes engagement of people and carers living with dementia, supporting organisation to join the campaign, newsletters and events, Dementia Friends sessions, recruiting volunteers to aid the campaign.

Tender Title: Get Set Leeds - Local Process Evaluation Partner
